name: CreateOneOffEvent
description:
Create a one-off event type in Calendly.

This tool is used to create a one-off event type in Calendly, allowing users to schedule unique events not linked to recurring event types.

parameters.name: event_details
parameters.description: JSON containing event parameters like name, host URI, co-host URIs, duration, timezone, date setting, and location.

co_hosts.description: Collection of meeting co-host(s) user URIs

timezone.description: Time zone used for meeting. Defaults to host's time zone.

value_schema.description: Parameters for creating One-Off Event Type

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: Parameters for creating One-Off Event Type

co_hosts.description: Collection of meeting co-host(s) user URIs

timezone.description: Time zone used for meeting. Defaults to host's time zone.

value_schema.description: Parameters for creating One-Off Event Type

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
